ISSUE.TITLE: Ticket list shows all tickets instead of open tickets only when selected from left menu
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug If you open the ticket list from left menu all tickets are shwon instead of open tickets only ### Dolibarr Version 20.0 ### Environment PHP PHP 8.x ### Environment Database n/a ### Steps to reproduce the behavior and expected behavior Enable Ticket module Select Top Menu Ticket Select Ticket List from left menu All tickets are shown instead of open tickets only ### Attached files _No response_
